item.description:
Hoping there are other FAMILIES in this meetup group! Please join us at the MFA for a PlayDate (hosted by the MFA). We have gone several times and each time, my daughter enjoys more and more of the exhibits, etc.

There is a story time held in an exhibit space related to the art theme or the month. Then a crafty art project for the kids. We also stay for lunch and take in a couple more exhibits.

I host this meetup event from another meetup as well. So I will let us know the total count when finalized! We will meet at the 'Christmas Tree' like sculpture in the Shapiro Visitor center before getting assigned into a group.

Pack a lunch for the kiddos unless you want to try the cafeteria. There's a cute cafe near the bookstore in the MFA where I like to have lunch with my girl! The activity ends by 11:30 but you are all invited to stay for lunch with us and take in more exhibits afterward!

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: MFA PlayDate for Babies, Tots & Preschoolers
